summary: A simple peasant is forced to take up arms to defend his farm during the Spanish Civil War. Along the way he falls in love with Russian whose father is involved in espionage.
cast: Madeleine Carroll|Henry Fonda|Leo Carrillo|John Halliday|Reginald Denny|Vladimir Sokoloff|Robert Warwick|Fred Kohler|Carlos De Valdez|Peter Godfrey|Nick Thompson|Rosina Galli|William B. Davidson|Lupita Tovar|Katherine DeMille|George Houston|Ricca Allen|Sam Appel|Arthur Aylesworth|Paul Bradley|Ed Brady|Guy D'Ennery|Baby Maria De La Paz|Roger Drake|Dolores Duran|Demetris Emanuel|Fern Emmett|Antonio Filauri|Mary Foy|Al Ernest Garcia|Herbert Heywood|George Lloyd|Murdock MacQuarrie|George Magrill|Chris-Pin Martin|John 'Skins' Miller|Belle Mitchell|Alberto Morin|Stanley Price|Hugh Prosser|Roman Ros|Evelyn Selbie|Harry Semels|Philip Sleeman|Carl Stockdale|Cecil Weston
title: Bloqueo
